QueryViewSpec.Name: Sponsorship Opportunity Note Extension Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Query to view Sponsorship Opportunity Note Extension Fields
QueryViewSpec.Author: Bill Elfstrom

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select USR_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYNOTEEXTENSION.DATE_PROOFED, USR_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYNOTEEXTENSION.ID from dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYNOTEEXTENSION join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYNOTE on USR_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYNOTEEXTENSION.ID = dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYNOTE.ID
